content: faux mistake rib touque was inspired by several other fun crochet hat patterns and has been updated with techniques learned from slip_stitch crochet designer lyudmila hefny this iteration of the hat was designed to complement northmoor watchcaps a knitted hat designed by luise o neill faux mistake and northmoor were chosen for the august 22 hal for the hats for sailors ravelry group as this hat is crocheted side-to-side in narrow wedges it s easy to adapt to whatever size you wish to crochet with whatever yarn you choose as designed the hat is extra tall to allow for a generous turn-up of the brim but it can easily be adapted to a single layer beanie style by just reducing the number of stitches in the hatband and/or body this hat looks great in a solid color or in a long self-striping yarn short color-break variegated yarns might work but can be overwhelming ++++++++++++ mistake on the chart forgot to explain t in the chart key t = half_double_crochet
